titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on ion exchange resin of benzene, diethenyl, polymer, with ethnylbenzene and ethenylethylbenzene, chloromethylated, trimethylaminoquaternized.
A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on ion exchange resin of benzene, diethenyl, polymer, with ethnylbenzene and ethenylethylbenzene, chloromethylated, trimethylaminoquaternized.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on ion exchange resin of benzene, diethenyl, polymer, with ethnylbenzene and ethenylethylbenzene, chloromethylated, trimethylaminoquaternized.
